title: Bitbucket Deployments
name: auth0-bitbucket-deploy
author: auth0
description: This extension gives Auth0 customers the possibility to deploy Rules and Custom Database Connections from Bitbucket.
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension? Doing so will stop any Rules and Database Connection scripts from being deployed from Bitbucket to Auth0.

auth0.scopes: update:tenant_settings update:clients read:clients read:client_keys read:connections update:connections read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules delete:clients

BITBUCKET_REPOSITORY.description: The repository from which you want to deploy rules and database scripts

BITBUCKET_BRANCH.description: The branch we should monitor for commits

SLACK_INCOMING_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Webhook URL for Slack used to notify you of successful and failed deployments
